__e: We are coming out of the darkness into a new world, a kindlier world, where men will rise above their hate, their greed and their brutality.
He said everything here was built on greed, killing, and that it'd go on that way.
We can't all be born innocent, pure, and good. Where does greed and the desire to harm others come from?
Your life of murder, and greed is over.
- I don't believe it. - Greed is no longer good, Johnny.
